name: animated-window-manager
title: Animated Window Manager
subtitle: Simple window manager, but with smooth animations
description: Manage your windows with macOS-like animations
author: matheuschein

commands.name: move-left
commands.title: Animate Window Left
commands.description: Move your window to the left of your screen with a smooth animation

commands.name: move-right
commands.title: Animate Window Right
commands.description: Move your window to the right of your screen with a smooth animation

commands.name: maximize
commands.title: Animate Window Maximize
commands.description: Maximize your window to the full size of your screen with a smooth animation

commands.name: reasonable-size
commands.title: Animate Reasonable Size
commands.subtitle: 30% width, 70% height, centered
commands.description: Set your window to a reasonable size with a smooth animation

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
